name: SFPUC Customer Assistance Program (CAP)
description: Increased 40% discount on water and sewer bills; protections from shutoffs/late fees for CAP participants
fullDescription: The San Francisco Public Utilities Commission Customer Assistance Program provides significant discounts on water and sewer bills plus protections from shutoffs for income-qualified San Francisco residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- 40% discount on water and sewer bills
- Protection from service shutoffs
- No late fees for CAP participants
- Applies to all SFPUC water/sewer charges
- Automatic enrollment renewal
- Crisis assistance available
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Francisco resident
2. Check income eligibility requirements
3. Enroll through SFPUC website or call
4. Provide proof of income
5. Once approved, discount applied to bills
6. Re-certify periodically
keywords: SFPUC, CAP, water bill, sewer bill, 40% discount, low-income, San Francisco, shutoff protection, no late fees
